note.p: Research Field: Natural history, entomology, evolutionary biology
Career: Tutor, Keble College, Oxford; Lecturer in Natural Science, Jesus College, Oxford.
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; DSB vol 18 pp 721-727
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1942-1944 vol 4 pp 655-680, plate, by G D Hale Carpenter
References: A Cohen, 'Roland Trimen and the merope harem' in NR 2002 vol 56 pp 205-218
